content.query:
/* create schema for dimension tables */
--CREATE SCHEMA [dim]

/* create dim table */
CREATE TABLE [dim].[Vaccine]
(
    vaccine_key INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , vaccine_name nvarchar(50) not NULL
    , us_price FLOAT
    , eu_price FLOAT
    , doses_required INT
    , days_apart INT
)
GO
